title: Phobia - Volume 1
description: "Phobia - Volume 1" is a collection of 12 dark and disturbing ambient backgrounds
longDescription:
• Preview the collection on Youtube


Phobia - Volume 1 is a collection of 12 dark and disturbing ambient backgrounds.

The mood delivers fear and tension, giving you the right underscore for any suspenseful and tension scene into the realms of crime, horror, sci-fi, survival or stealth.

This pack is produced by Luca Tomassini a composer with more than 20 years of expertise in music production with multiple TV, feature films and multimedia placements.Â 


The collection features extensive loops and intros/outros for further editing.


Dark Room: Full length (02:03), 4 Loops, Intro&Outro

Abstract Robotic Percussions: Full length (03:12), 6 Loops, Intro&Outro

Ambient Drone - Mysterious Nights: Full length (01:45), 5 Loops, Intro&Outro

Concrete Landscape In Ruins: Full length (01:37), 6 Loops, Intro&Outro

Confessions Of A Serial Killer: Full length (02:38), 11 Loops, Intro&Outro

Disturbed: Full length (04:00), 6 Loops, Intro&Outro

Dystopia Drone: Full length (01:30), 5 Loops, Intro&Outro

Restless Ghosts: Full length (02:06), 8 Loops, Intro&Outro

Ripped Flesh: Full length (01:48), 8 Loops, Intro&Outro

Twisted Nightmare: Full length (02:10), 7 Loops, Intro&Outro

Wandering In The Dark: Full length (01:47), 5 Loops, Intro&Outro

Your Most Disturbing Nightmare: Full length (02:03), 8 Loops, Intro&Outro


Take a look: Total Game Music Collection - 500 High Quality music themes ideal for any game!

Also take a look: Fright Night - Vol.1 and Fright Night - Vol.2
technicalDetails:
Features:

12 Full length tracks

24 Intro /Outro

79 Loops


Number of Audio Wavs: 114

Number of Audio Cues: 114

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 01:19:49

Supported Development Platforms: All


- Terms of Usage and Licensing Notes outside the game engine.

All packages by Frequently Asked Music are meant to be used within Unreal Engine. Please contact us at studio@frequentlyaskedmusic.com for further clearance in case you want to use a specific track for other purposes - YouTube videos, social marketing, promo.
